administrator:
{#c}
  {#y}Help{#c} - Available Commands:

  -> {#y}Dashboard{#c}: Show your dashboard overview
  -> {#y}Products{#c}: List your E-Mail, VPS, VDS, and Game Server products
  -> {#y}Cart{#c}: Show your cart
  -> {#y}Mails{#c}: Check all customers' emails
  -> {#y}Email{#c}: Open your email
  -> {#y}Users{#c}: Manage user accounts
  -> {#y}Logs{#c}: View customer or system logs
  -> {#y}Reports{#c}: Generate system reports
  -> {#y}Logout{#c}: Log out of your account
customer:
{#c}
  Help - Available Commands:

  -> {#y}Dashboard{#c}: Show your dashboard
  -> {#y}Products{#c}: List your E-Mail, VPS, VDS, and Game Server products
  -> {#y}Cart{#c}: Show your cart

  -> {#y}Logs{#c}: View your logs
  -> {#y}Logout{#c}: Log out of your account
